日.definition: sun; day; date, day of the month

日久.definition: with the passage of time; over time

日久彌新.definition: see 歷久彌新|历久弥新[li4 jiu3 mi2 xin1]

日久歲深.definition: (idiom) for a long period of time; for a number of years

日人民報.definition: (vulgar) derogatory name (in which 日[ri4] means 肏[cao4]) for the "People's Daily" 人民日報|人民日报[Ren2 min2 Ri4 bao4]

日你媽.definition: see 肏你媽|肏你妈[cao4 ni3 ma1]

日來.definition: in the past few days; lately

日俄戰爭.definition: the war of 1904-1905 between Russia and Japan

日元.definition: Japanese yen (unit of currency); also written 日圓|日圆[Ri4 yuan2]

日內.definition: in a few days; one of these days

日出而作，日入而息.pinyin: ri4 chu1 er2 zuo4 , ri4 ru4 er2 xi1
日出而作，日入而息.definition: lit. to get up at sunrise and work until sunset (proverb); fig. to lead a plain and hardworking life

日前.definition: the other day; a few days ago

日化.definition: household chemicals (cleaning products etc) and toiletries (abbr. for 日用化學製品|日用化学制品[ri4 yong4 hua4 xue2 zhi4 pin3]); (linguistics) to rhotacize; rhotic

日喀則.definition: see 日喀則市|日喀则市[Ri4ka1ze2 Shi4]

日喀則市.definition: Xigazê, prefecture-level city in Tibet Autonomous Region 西藏自治區|西藏自治区[Xi1zang4 Zi4zhi4qu1]

日圓.definition: Japanese yen (unit of currency); CL:個|个[ge4]

日土.definition: Rutog county in Ngari prefecture, Tibet, Tibetan: Ru thog rdzong

日土縣.definition: Rutog county in Ngari prefecture, Tibet, Tibetan: Ru thog rdzong

日夜.definition: day and night; around the clock

日子.definition: day; a (calendar) date; days of one's life

日心說.definition: heliocentric theory; the theory that the sun is at the center of the universe

日惹.definition: Yogyakarta, city of Java, Indonesia, and capital of the Special Region of Yogyakarta 日惹特區|日惹特区[Ri4 re3 Te4 qu1]

日惹特區.definition: Special Region of Yogyakarta, region of Java, Indonesia

日料.definition: Japanese cuisine (abbr. for 日本料理[Ri4 ben3 liao4 li3])

日新月異.definition: daily renewal, monthly change (idiom); every day sees new developments; rapid progress

日方.definition: the Japanese side or party (in negotiations etc)

日暮途窮.definition: sunset, the end of the road (idiom); in terminal decline; at a dead end

日曬雨淋.definition: lit. exposed to sun and rain (idiom); fig. exposed to the elements

日月.definition: the sun and moon; day and month; every day and every month; season; life and livelihood

日月五星.definition: sun, moon and the five visible planets

日月如梭.definition: the sun and moon like a shuttle (idiom); How time flies!

日月暈.definition: halo; ring of light around the sun or moon

日月潭.definition: Sun Moon Lake in Nantou County, Taiwan

日月重光.definition: the sun and moon shine once more; fig. things get back to normal after an upheaval

日本原子能研究所.pinyin: Ri4 ben3 Yuan2 zi3 Neng2 Yan2 jiu1 suo3

日本叉尾海燕.pinyin: Ri4 ben3 cha1 wei3 hai3 yan4
日本叉尾海燕.definition: (bird species of China) Matsudaira's storm petrel (Hydrobates matsudairae)

日本國誌.definition: A Record of Japan, by Huang Zunxian 黃遵憲|黄遵宪[Huang2 Zun1 xian4], an extended analysis of Meiji Japan

日本放送協會.pinyin: Ri4 ben3 Fang4 song4 Xie2 hui4
日本放送協會.definition: NHK (Nihon Hōsō Kyōkai), Japanese national broadcasting company

日本書紀.definition: Nihonshoki or Chronicles of Japan (c. 720) book of mythology and history

日本松雀鷹.definition: (bird species of China) Japanese sparrowhawk (Accipiter gularis)

日本柳鶯.definition: (bird species of China) Japanese leaf warbler (Phylloscopus xanthodryas)

日本樹鶯.definition: (bird species of China) Japanese bush warbler (Horornis diphone)

日本歌鴝.definition: (bird species of China) Japanese robin (Larvivora akahige)

日本沼蝦.definition: oriental river prawn (Macrobrachium nipponense), a species of freshwater shrimp, also called 青蝦|青虾[qing1 xia1]

日本經濟新聞.pinyin: Ri4 ben3 Jing1 ji4 Xin1 wen2
日本經濟新聞.definition: Nikkei Shimbun, Japanese equivalent of Financial Times

日本繡眼鳥.definition: (bird species of China) warbling white-eye (Zosterops japonicus)

日本電報電話公司.pinyin: Ri4 ben3 Dian4 bao4 Dian4 hua4 Gong1 si1

日本鬼子.definition: Japanese devil (common term of abuse in wartime China and in subsequent writing)

日本鵪鶉.definition: (bird species of China) Japanese quail (Coturnix japonica)

日本鶺鴒.definition: (bird species of China) Japanese wagtail (Motacilla grandis)

日活用戶.definition: daily active users (of a website, service etc)

日流.definition: the spread of Japanese cultural products (anime, pop music etc) to other countries

日漸.definition: to progress (or increase, change etc) day by day; more (or better etc) with each passing day

日照市.definition: Rizhao, prefecture-level city in Shandong Province 山東省|山东省[Shan1dong1 Sheng3]

日環食.definition: an annular eclipse of the sun

日產.definition: Nissan, Japanese car make; also transliterated 尼桑[Ni2 sang1]

日用品.definition: articles for daily use; CL:件[jian4],個|个[ge4]

日益.definition: day by day; more and more; increasingly; more and more with each passing day

日知錄.definition: Rizhilu or Record of daily study, by early Confucian philosopher Gu Yanwu 顧炎武|顾炎武

日積月累.definition: to accumulate over a long period of time

日經.definition: Nikkei, abbr. for Nikkei Shimbun 日本經濟新聞|日本经济新闻[Ri4 ben3 Jing1 ji4 Xin1 wen2]; abbr. for Nikkei 225 index 日經指數|日经指数[Ri4 jing1 zhi3 shu4]

日經平均指數.pinyin: Ri4 jing1 ping2 jun1 zhi3 shu4

日至.definition: solstice; the winter solstice 冬至 and summer solstice 夏至

日臻.definition: to reach day after day for

日航.definition: Japan Airlines (JAL) (abbr. for 日本航空[Ri4ben3 Hang2kong1])

日英聯軍.definition: Anglo-Japanese allied army (intervention during Russian revolution and civil war 1917-1922)

日落西山.definition: the sun sets over western hills (idiom); the day approaches its end; fig. time of decline; the end of an era; Sic transit gloria mundi

日落風生.definition: a gentle breeze comes with sunset (idiom)

日薄崦嵫.definition: lit. the sun sets in Yanzi (idiom); fig. the day is drawing to an end; the last days (of a person, a dynasty etc)

日行一善.definition: to do a good deed every day

日趨.definition: (increasing) day by day; (more critical) with every passing day; gradually

日趨嚴重.definition: more critical with every passing day

日電.definition: NEC (Nippon Electronic Company); abbr. for 日電電子|日电电子
